item.title: Ep. 01 – Episode Title: Innovative Impacts and Global Insights
item.description:
**Summary:** In this episode, we explore the transformative power of innovation and its unexpected impacts on society. We delve into the role of triglyceride-glucose indices in diagnosing liver health and the influence of auditor independence on internal audit quality. Additionally, we discuss Nigeria's socioeconomic challenges and the sonic identities of recording studios, while examining the resilience of critical care practices through a case of chloral hydrate toxicity survival. Join us for a journey across diverse fields, highlighting pivotal research and its broader implications.

Discussed Papers

  • L’innovation à impact : symbole d’une nouvelle ère, mais pas celle que l’on pense
    Innovations
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.3917/inno.pr2.0176
  • TRİGLİSERİD-YÜKSEK YOĞUNLUKLU LİPOPROTEİN KOLESTEROL ORANI (TG/HDL) VE TRİGLİSERİD-GLUKOZ (TyG) İNDEKSİNİN HEPATOSTEATOZDAKİ YERİ
    Atlas Universitesi Tip ve Saglik Bilimleri Dergisi
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.54270/atljm.2025.91
  • تأثير استقلالية المدقق وخبرته في جودة التدقيق الداخلي (دراسة تحليلية)
    Al-Ghary Journal of Economic and Administrative Sciences
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.36325/ghjec.v21i3.18789.
  • Insecurity, government expenditure and income levels in Nigeria: responses and implications
    Expresión Económica
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.32870/eera.vi55.1214
  • Performing the place: Delineating sonic signatures from recording studio spaces
    Journal of Music Production Research
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.1386/jmpr_00003_1
  • Pulsing images. Interventionen in die Unverfügbarkeit von Bildern in libanesischen, palästinensischen und israelischen Filmen
    Unknown Journal
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.4472/9783035809053
  • NEUROLOGICALLY INTACT SURVIVAL FOLLOWING CARDIAC ARREST FROM CHLORAL HYDRATE TOXICITY: A SHOWCASE OF MODERN CRITICAL CARE
    Eskisehir Medical Journal, Eskisehir City Hospital
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.48176/esmj.2025.222
